Dear Bernardina of the heart  
Piratini, December 14, 1837.

Due to the haste with which the bearer is about to depart, this letter serves solely to inform you that I am much improved in my foot; besides this, I assure you that tomorrow my friend Bento Gonçalves will arrive here, after which I might make a visit there.

Send me word on how our children are doing, to whom you will give many embraces, and recommend me to the godfather and godmother, and likewise to the family of José Rodrigues; and you can always count on your very loving husband, Almeida.

Recommendations from me to Your Mercy Carlota. Peçanha

Madam, Pedras Altas.
